tweets.text: River levels still high in York today, but will recede over the next 24 hours or so. We urge people to be careful around floodwater and not attempt to drive through flooded roads. Check your flood risk: https://t.co/h4ufUzQwK2 https://t.co/17aF8eckcT

Work to encourage channel avulsion on Swindale beck finally crosses tipping point. Recent floods have started an avulsion creating 5 hectares of anastomosing wetland. Minor intervention and patience have eventually paid off!
@RSPBEngland @EnvAgencyNW @SalfordScience @SalfordHydro https://t.co/biaKE3rFDA
Current #ACESConf20 session being delivered by Marina Robertson and Alex Gee from @npsgroupuk then Sarah Davies from @EnvAgency https://t.co/uK04fgdSpn

Chernobyl: #bumblebees still at risk from #radiation nearly 35 years on. Feat. #UofStirling's Dr Katherine Raines via @ConversationUK  Read the full story üëáüêùhttps://t.co/11aV7Y3AfX @NERCscience @anchorage40 @EnvAgency @rwm_gdf_uk @SRP_UK

- @StormMeisterFP: At least one in six properties is at risk of #flooding in England according to the @EnvAgency
https://t.co/8WYReqExXn

More willowed leaky dams being installed to slow the flow of floodwaters on the #SmithillsEstate #WinterHill @WoodlandTrust @EnvAgencyNW @natural_course @Hazel_Phill @rivernim @PownallJames https://t.co/lA9KmIcpfO
Why??? https://t.co/vfVeM6M3ZG

Fish, meet Rivers. Rivers, meet Fish.  

Removal of this disused weir on the River Tonge took place last week with @EnvAgencyNW @natural_course in a bid to help Fish swim freely and reach their natural spawning grounds. https://t.co/B3d5sLB9YL

Our Field Teams have been working with partners strengthening our knowledge & resources to make sure we are ready to respond this winter

At our #Sale depot the teams have been training on temporary flood barrier deployment & performing a sandbag wall exercise

#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/5GlpVPJZ1r
Why does @EnvAgency TFS data not show the end destination for the 90ktpa of waste being shipped to Bulgaria as it does for every other EU country? https://t.co/x3uDTFbdZ0 #edjnet

CE Case Study: The Environment Agency @EnvAgency delivers its future ¬£5.2bn capital programme through the Next Generation #Supplier Arrangements (NGSA) #Collaborative Delivery #Framework.
https://t.co/UCj333YK4O https://t.co/JpRztWwCLS
